docs.title: AI Consulting Services
docs.text: At Avalon Technical Solutions, we specialize in developing cutting-edge AI systems. With over 6 years of experience in designing advanced algorithmic software solutions, we are dedicated to helping businesses leverage the power of artificial intelligence to solve complex problems and drive innovation. Whether you're looking to develop custom AI solutions, enhance your existing systems, or explore new AI technologies, we're here to assist you every step of the way.

docs.title: Our Expertise
docs.text:
With a proven track record of building scalable, maintainable AI systems across multiple industries including Security, Media, and Oceanography, we bring a wealth of knowledge and experience to every project. Our expertise includes:

  • Custom AI Solutions: Tailored AI solutions to meet your specific business needs, ensuring operational efficiency and enhanced product feasibility.
  • AI Strategy and Roadmap: Comprehensive AI strategy development and implementation, from ideation to deployment.
  • Data Analysis and Modeling: Advanced data analysis and predictive modeling to unlock valuable insights from your data.
  • Machine Learning: Development and deployment of machine learning models, with a focus on computer vision and deep learning applications.
  • Large Language Models: Expertise in developing and implementing large language models for various applications.

Email to learn more about our services and how we can help you achieve your AI goals.

docs.title: ResumAid - AI powered Resume Tailoring
docs.text: Our AI-powered resume tailoring application helps job seekers optimize their resumes for specific job postings. Built with Streamlit, the app leverages OpenAI's capabilities to enhance and personalize your resume, increasing your chances of landing your desired job.

docs.title: Sketch2Diagram
docs.text: Stay tuned for our upcoming project focused on converting hand drawn sketches into Draw.io diagraming software.
